synopsis.text: Hokaze Kon, an ordinary boy immersed in an MMORPG, is thrust into an extraordinary adventure when he is mysteriously summoned to the alternate realm of Mira, brimming with an enigmatic energy called Alma. Upon his arrival, he serendipitously saves Princess Ecarlate from her assailants, inadvertently entangling himself in her political affairs and the struggle surrounding Alma. With no clue on how he ended up in Mira or how to return home, Kon joins Princess Ecarlate's entourage as a member of her honor guard, while a militant faction from her own country relentlessly pursues her to thwart her impending arranged marriage. This thrilling anime follows Kon's journey as he navigates this new world, filled with danger, intrigue, and the unknown.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
